name: FunFacts
0:
”Alexa, open fun facts”
”Alexa, start fun facts”
”Alexa, ask fun facts for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fun facts
des:
Ask Alexa for interesting facts. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.

A fact is a statement that can be verified and also seen as a component of evidence. It can be proven to be true or false through objective evidence.
With this Skill you can grow your factual knowledge and have fun while doing so by just asking "Alexa" to give you a "fun fact".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
